channel.title: development on The Odd Bit
channel.description: Recent content in development on The Odd Bit

item.title: Funny usage message
item.description: I was poking around in a command shell on my Droid to see what was available. While it’s a pretty restricted environment, there’s a number of commands available in /system/bin, including dexopt. Apparently dexopt isn’t something I’m supposed to poke at: $ dexopt Usage: don't use this Hah.
